website_summaries.verdict: A popular German-designed coffee maker that utilises the power of a thermal jug for maintaining temperatures without a warming plate.
pros: Offers sleek, stainless steel construction with an insulated jug that keeps coffee warm and flavourful for hours
Easy to program to make small or large brews
cons: Tends to dribble from the spout when you pour a cup

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine. It makes coffee as good as any other on the market but this little beauty has a timer function (like a teas maid) so you can set it to make the coffee 15minutes before you wake in the morning meaning you have a fresh pot of coffee waiting for you after your morning shower pour your coffee into a travel mug, jump in the car and you've saved valuable time meaning an extra 5 minutes in bed....perfect
customer_reviews.author: Not so PC Jackson

customer_reviews.title: I dislike mess and I like hot coffee
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as it has a insulated jug, it keeps my coffee hot for 3hrs, I love using paper filters strait into the bin or garden no cleaning those horrible screens, also as the jug is insulated I can take the jug to my desk and work.
customer_reviews.author: H. Viola

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a great coffee machine. Setup is very easy and it's easy to use. The thermo jug keeps the coffee hot for a few hours and warm enough to drink for about 4 hours. It's easy to clean and the lid comes off of the pot easily. The water thank is not removable, so use the pot to fill up the water. The timer works as expected. Brewing is fairly quiet and fast. Resulting coffee tasted great and nice and hot.
customer_reviews.author: Sven

customer_reviews.title: How did I live without this!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a number of coffee machines over the years but this is without doubt my favourite. The proof of this is that I use it most days whereas others have sat gathering dust after initial use. I love this because it is simple, it keeps my coffee hot without it stewing on a hot plate and very importantly it is very easy and quick to clean. It keeps the coffee hot for a good three hours and very warm probably a little longer. You can make as much or as little as you like. I use paper coffee filters but you can buy a gold permanent filter if you prefer. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: It got sent back. Useless!
customer_reviews.text: I can't find anything good to say about this Melitta filter coffee machine and sent it back to receive a refund. Instead I bought a stainless steel Bialetti 10-cup stovetop espresso maker which produces a most satisfying cup of hot steaming caffeine to boost my office days. But that Melitta? Honestly, I haven't a polite word to say for it! Massive fail in all areas. I want to taste my coffee and enjoy it, not spit it out. 1 Star, but deserving Zero.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Piglet

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Convenient and makes Great Coffee
customer_reviews.text: My favourite Coffee Maker so far. After having a second leaky reservoir from a pod type machine for which I struggled to get black coffee pods for in the shops, I decided to go back to filter and don’t regret it one bit. It’s cheaper to run as the paper filters not too costly and can buy lovely great priced coffee from a certain German supermarket. I love having the timer function on our particular model too. I set it each night for 6am and coffee still at drinking temperature by 9am (and beyond) due to the brilliant thermal jug. It’s quiet, reliable and makes a gorgeous cup of coffee (well several) all at once. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: HippyChick

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more
customer_reviews.text: Use to to have a russell hobbs filter coffee machine and thought that was good,until the second one broke down. Did some reserch and found out about this one.what a difference,easier to use,quieter,more economical, great coffee ,easy to clean out with the paper filters and really hot coffee!! No more turning the machine on again to keep the the coffee hot as with the russell hobbs,because the thermos jug really keeps it hot easily for a couple of hours,just right for a lazy sunday morning. I spent a little more and you can see the diffence in quality.I like this machine
customer_reviews.author: fml

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent machine, however, the main drawback is the metal jug which immediately cools the coffee down. Perhaps it isn't too bad if you make a full jug everytime but not great for smaller quantities as you end up with mildly warm content. Also, you never know how much coffee there is left in the jug. I opted for a steel jug option hoping it would maintain coffee's taste better but due to the above I rate this product and idea itself quite poorly.
customer_reviews.author: daz

customer_reviews.title: Need a great coffee machine with no leak or breaking down? Perfect taste? Then buy this
customer_reviews.text: Wasted so much money on coffee machines b4 finally giving in and buying a melitta! What can I say....I wish I had done so before! From the first cup you will know what real coffee tastes like. Even though it doesn't have a keep warm button the thermal mug does that for you. I had my timer set for 6am snd I over slept for work today and the coffee was still steaming hot like it had just been ran. Love love love it! My next purchase is gunna be the melitta with the ground beans but this melitta is going nowhere. I'm s coffee addict so I know my coffee. Trust me you NEED THIS
customer_reviews.author: Liv Robertson

customer_reviews.title: ...Well worth the money 👌
customer_reviews.text: ...Braw!!!...Lovely cup of coffee from a cracking coffee machine. My last Tesco's-cheap-as-chips coffee machine gave up the ghost on Sunday morning 🤯...so I bought this beauty, it makes a braw cuppa Java☕ and the thermal jug keeps the freshly brewed coffee hot for at least an' hour after making it. I haven't tried the timer system yet, but if the initial results are anything to go by I'm sure I won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: CopieFaePerth

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic machine
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine who had a commercial Melitta coffee machine in her cafe swears by her machine and I always loved the coffee, so when I needed a new coffee machine I decided to go for this smaller version. Well I am not disappointed at all, every aspect of this machine, timer, brewing capacity, no hot plate (so no waste of electric) and down to the brilliant thermos pot are excellent and it brews a brilliant cup of coffee. To be honest I prefer the paper filters rather than permanent filters as it gives in my opinion a better flavour, anyway would highly recommend this machine you really will not be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Petapops

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and no more grinds at the bottom of the cup
customer_reviews.text: This is nice looking, easy to clean and produces tasty coffee - with none of those nasty grounds at the bottom of your cup. I have been using a cafetière for years but then read an article saying the best way to drink coffee is with an old school coffee maker. My parents had similar in the 80s but modern improvements include a base which isn’t heated and is therefore safer - as the jug is metal and insulated (and therefore also not hot to the touch). Love this and use nearly every day.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: Looked good but European plug means it couldn't be used
customer_reviews.text: Looked like a reasonable coffee maker from reviews for price, but came with a European style plug, not even a UK adapter. Not willing to use a machine for prolonged period of time using adapter. Can't review actually quality of machine. No clear mention of European plug anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: main coffee maker at work
customer_reviews.text: If you have used the Melitta funnels and filter this is a coffee maker with thermos flask effectively. Good coffee, well filtered and kept warm for long periods, as with any thermos type system, if you remove coffee (and replace it with room temperature air) it cools down quicker. The maker has a timer for a coffee when you walk through the door.
customer_reviews.author: T. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: It's the Beez Kneez.
customer_reviews.text: I shall add this glowing review to the growing list of users who think this is the beez kneez. I've had it for about a month now and it's just flashed up that it needs a 'de-calc' due to the super hard water we have here. Easy to do and great to know when to run the programme (a little light comes on). This is my third filter coffee maker (others from lesser manufacturers) and I'm thinking it'll be my last... it really is that good. If you enjoy a nice cup of java, buy one!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Higgs

customer_reviews.title: The perfect coffee machine for those lazy mornings
customer_reviews.text: Looking to replace our 10+ year old coffee machine, only to realise there's no longer a hotplate that keeps your coffee warm for longer than 30 minutes. However this is an amazing alternative. Gone are the days when we have to pop downstairs to fill up our cup for our next coffee. We just take the thermal coffee pot and a milk jug and enjoy a relaxing morning in bed. The coffee stays piping hot for at least 2 hours. The taste is perfect and the timer is set every weekend. Couldn't live without it. Great when guests are round too. Can't fault it. Make this your next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Makes good coffee AT THE RIGHT TEMPERATURE that stays hot in the thermal flask
customer_reviews.text: I have had several filter coffee makers over the decades (they don't last forever). Previously my husband and I had to by more than one to find one that made coffee at the right temperature without needing a hot plate to keep it warm (several had to be taken back). This is the best so far and the Timer function is so useful for having the coffee ready for you in the morning. The decalc function is also useful, for monitoring when required and for automatically slowly filtering through it.. The ability to alter the strength may be useful, but I have it set to the strongest so I haven't tried it.out any other setting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: It's a good brand love the flask instead of the glass jug . Coffee stays hot without power on.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: does the job but lacks a some useful features
customer_reviews.text: this filter coffee machine produces fine tasting coffee. the mechanism is very easy to use and you have nifty controls for selecting water hardness. however, i found it surprising that it takes 25 minutes to brew coffee (regardless of volume) and at the end of the timer, it make no sound to alert the user. my use of the machine involves setting things up and then turning on a timer on my digital watch to be notified when the coffee will be done. usable but far from ideal.
customer_reviews.author: SHS

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee machine
customer_reviews.text: This is my third coffee pot this year. The light of my life and all round good guy, my hubby, is also a clumsy oaf. He's managed to bounce two glass jugs round the kitchen. It goes against my nature to throw things away so try as I might to get replacement jugs I've ended up getting a new device. This coffee pot comes with two excellent features in one. The metal jug! It not only claims to be indestructible but it keeps the coffee hot. It really does keep it hot too. It means there is no keep warm feature, because it is not required. So, robust and a more eco friendly. I am genuinely delighted with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Very good apart from pouring
customer_reviews.text: So we love this coffee machine, makes great coffees, keeps it nice and want and not burnt.........but when pouring for some reason the coffee drips everywhere, every time.Without fail wherever you pour you'll have a nice puddle of coffee.Really disappointing as the rest of the machine is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Storry's

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Melitta Look IV Therm Timer coffee maker as my wife required a coffee maker with a flask. The Coffee machine is great, easy to use and has a timer, if you are a morning coffee person it is ideal for the lovely fresh cup of coffee when you get up in the morning. The flask holds the contents at a good temperature for quite a long time. I definitely recommend this to any coffee lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Jethroe D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sleepy coffee person
customer_reviews.text: Ok so my husband NEEDS coffee in the morning. Since we moved, he was trying to make it with one of those single cup filter things... and every morning there was coffee all over the kitchen. We needed desperately a solution, and we got this one. It is easy enough for a sleepy man to get it going! no spillages since, and the coffee is pretty good, and stays warm all morning. Now everyone is happy in the mornings.
customer_reviews.author: N. G. P

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and robust
customer_reviews.text: This was a little more than I wanted to spend, but it really shows you get what you pay for. it was delivered quickly, and we are very pleased with it, albeit only day one :) The machine is brilliant, it is easy to use, the water level on the side is helpful too. THE MOST AMAZING THIS IS THAT THE COFFEE IS MAKES IS REALLY HOT ! ! ! YESSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS! LOVE it ! will update this if it lets me down, but after deliberating and deciding I am so pleased to have chosen this one !
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Love this coffee machine, perfect coffee every time!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this coffee machine. Coffee comes out lovely and smooth no sludge in bottom of cup like the previous machine. Coffee stays hot in the thermos jug without changing the taste of the coffee. Since the start of lockdown hubby working from home and using coffee machine alot more, this one will be alot more cost effective as we dont throw the cold coffee away, just wish id bought it sooner. Had the ninja coffee bar before this which was almost twice the price and I would not recommend at all, but the Mellita is a great machine for a great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. A. K. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Keeps coffee wonderfully hot.
customer_reviews.text: We are delighted with this coffee maker which keeps coffee wonderfully hot for over an hour and DOESN'T LEAK! Previous units from other makers either leaked over the jug or worktop or were hard to pour without spilling. This unit has a small footprint so it fits into a corner, heats up quickly and then keeps the coffee hot in the insulated jug which is great. The only drawback is that you have to tilt the jug up a long way to pour out the last few drops which people with arthritic hands might find difficult.
customer_reviews.author: MR H.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is more expensive than a lot of machines, but having had one of the cheaper ones previously, this one is definitely superior. It looks stylish and makes a lot of coffee, which stays warm due to the thermos-style coffee pot. Our old machine was terrible for leaking when pouring but this one is perfect. No leaks and pours well. I'm really happy with it as it has both good looks and functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Cat T

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hot coffee HOT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our morning coffee; one cup in bed, and another with breakfast. With our old machine, the second cup had to be microwaved hot; this bad boy does away with that, as the second cup is piping hot! The stainless steel thermos jug keeps it very hot for at least an hour. It may well do so for longer, but I haven't tried yet. As the power turns off after 15 minutes, the coffee doesn't stew, and retains full flavour. Very stylish design, well priced item; very very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: huporanj

customer_reviews.title: Stays hot for ages!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product. Coffee makers with hot plates can only stay warm for 40 minutes. This one has no hot plate, just a very well insulated jug. It keeps the coffee hot for at least two hours. I like plenty of strong coffee, ready for me when I wake up. The timer function works very well, and the coffee tastes great. No plastic taste, and a good strength. I use a permanent filter in it which works well but you can use paper ones if you wish. Looks smart too.
customer_reviews.author: "nowea001"

customer_reviews.title: In 5 Words: Best Filter Machine; Buy It!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic machine; arguably the best filter coffee machine on the market. Great design, easy to use and makes amazing coffee. The Aroma selector allows you to adjust strength to taste, and is a feature I’ve only seen on selected Melitta models. The unbreakable jug is a genius bit of design. Keeps the coffee hot for a couple of hours without the traditional hot plate design (which can actually burn and impair the flavour of the coffee). Saves electricity this way, and keeps warm a lot longer than other machines that power off the hot plate after 30 minutes. Removeable filter cone for easy cleaning too. No to mention a generous 24 month guarantee from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great concept-poor coffee
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this coffee maker: the fact that it has a thermal jug rather than a hot plate so the prepared coffee doesn't cook and turn bitter. it's light and easy to use. But and it's a big but, the coffee it produces is too weak no matter how much ground coffee you use! The water delivery system needs to be redesigned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine with one annoying fault...
customer_reviews.text: Works a treat and produces nice coffee. Insulated jug keeps coffee warm for ages and the bottom of the jug stays cool so you can put straight onto the table. Fast brew time - which is nice. The one problem? --- the Clock / Timer has not got a battery backup. That means that every time you unplug the machine the clock / timer is reset to 00.00 which makes it useless as you have to reset it every time you use the machine. This doesn't happen if you keep the machine plugged in but, never the less, it is, in my opinion, an avoidable fault in the design.
customer_reviews.author: Welsh Mountain Goat

customer_reviews.title: Just the job.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the reviews here are odd - I think this is a great coffee maker. Sure, it’s filter coffee so it’s not going to be barista quality but it’s great if you want filter coffee. The timer is great - love waking up to a big jug already made. The steel jug means I am not going to break it. I have found the coffee is still drinkably warm five hours later. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Stephen H

customer_reviews.title: Makes weak coffee
customer_reviews.text: I am really disappointed by how weak coffee comes out. I use double the amount of coffee my old coffee machine (which cost me half the price) required and I still get bland coffee, even with the aroma selector on maximum. Avoid if you enjoy strong coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Lee C

customer_reviews.title: Good solid coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Very solid build and looks good on the kitchen worktop. Easy to work and the thermos type jug keeps the coffee good and hot without the need for a hotplate. With the machine turning itself off as soon as the last of the water has gone through I assume it is more economical than my last filter coffee maker which left the hotplate on for about 30 minutes after the coffee had finished brewing. The opening at the top is quite small so you cannot get your hand in to clean it but I rinse it straight after use and it seems to clean quite easily. Pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TechMick

customer_reviews.title: A coffee maker for coffee vampires
customer_reviews.text: Coffee is my blood, over the years I have tried a lot of different machines and devices. Melitta is delivering the best performance by far for my steady stream of lifeblood coffee. I love the timer, my coffee is ready when I need it. Water is easy to pour in, cleaning is easy, adding filter and coffee is easy. I love the heat maintained in the jug, four hours later - I still have hot coffee waiting for me. It pours well, much better than all the glass jugs I have used. No hotplate needed as it is so heat efficient. Just make sure you properly engage the jug before you switch on. Superb product.
customer_reviews.author: Opus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Brew
customer_reviews.text: Had it a week, it's really very good. The thermal jug keeps the coffee warmer for longer than the old machine & the flavour is superb. The timer function is also excellent. Only one thing missing: some capacity indicators (in litres) on the water chamber.
customer_reviews.author: Bunter

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, great taste and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Our new coffee machine arrived today and we had our first coffee using it. Have to say it’s really good and I’m a complete snob when it comes to taste! Easy to use, easy to pour, and great fresh tasting coffee, nice and strong! I normally like espresso so was curious to see if it would be strong enough - it was perfect! Good value for money too very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Wright

customer_reviews.title: Good Fresh Coffee To Wake Up To
customer_reviews.text: I used to use 7 scoops of coffee in my old coffee filter machine which held less water, but I only need to use 5 to get the same strength and it holds more water. It's very easy to use and the timer works fabulously so we have good, fresh coffee to wake up to. The thermos jug keeps the coffee hot for a lot longer than 2 hours. I'm really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: kikisi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and smart looking drip coffee machine
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this coffee machine. Just to contrast with a few reviews which put me off from buying this at first: 1. I havr no issue with spilling coffee when pouring, however there is a small amount of coffee which cannot be poured out without tipping the fkask upside down which inevitably spills. 2. I read this coffee machine is just a single drip nozzle which isn't the case, it has an intensity dial to select between single and multi drip. Great purchase and looks smart too.
customer_reviews.author: J C

customer_reviews.title: Superb filter machine
customer_reviews.text: After having several espresso machines costing upwards of £350 that are a pain to use i went back to a good old filter machine. This one is amazing. So easy to use makes a pot full of perfect temperature coffee in under 10 minutes and the thermo pot keeps it hot for a good couple of hours. So much cheaper to buy bags of ground coffee rather than the overpriced pods I’ve been buying for years. I’d forgotten how good filter coffee is. The machine also looks really modern and stylish on the counter top.
customer_reviews.author: michael f

customer_reviews.title: Love this coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee maker. Coffee stays hot longer than the 2 hours. I saw a review where someone who purchased the white make didn’t have the ridges for pouring but the one I got does. I am so happy with this purchase and would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, great coffee
customer_reviews.text: This is just brilliant. I’ve had pod style machines before but with now working from home decided I’d like something that made a few coffees in one go. The timer is easy to use and I set it up each night so that I get up to a pot of coffee. The jug is very good, keeps coffee warm for several hours. And it makes really good coffee. I did a bit of research before I bought and worked out Melitta was the one I wanted and this is a really good value model.
customer_reviews.author: R. Molloy

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I've bought for a long time!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this coffee machine. I didn't realise that it didn't have a heated plate, but actually the insulated thermos-style pot keeps the coffee hot for a good few hours without it getting that burnt taste (as happens with my mum's hot plate style machine). The timer function works perfectly which is great for my partner who sometimes gets up at 4am for work. Less faff than a caffetiere. We use the melitta filter papers which make it super easy to get rid of the grounds. Best buy of 2020!
customer_reviews.author: Jade Denton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an old coffee machine and I’m so pleased I did. Using the filter papers makes for a smoother coffee and the thermal insulated jug keeps coffee warmer for longer without using more electricity on a “keep warm” function like some other brands. Like the design and look, plus it’s easy to set up and program. Would recommend to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: BigPaw77

customer_reviews.title: Very good coffeemaker
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic machine. Lovely flavour, provided you move the dial to strong coffee. Timer works well and can come in handy. The jug doesn't really need pre heating although for really hot coffee you might want to do it.
customer_reviews.author: harpoline

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, environmentally friendly too
customer_reviews.text: Fed up with our old coffee machines which kept breaking so though I would try this instead. So far very impressed, good tasting coffee. Having been used to a hot plate on our old machine which kept the coffee warm for 40 mins before shutting off I was a little apprehensive about not having a hot plate on this model which uses an insulated jug but actually its better for the environment because it use less electric and the jug keeps the coffee hot for over 2 hours so in fact I prefer this method.
customer_reviews.author: Phil B

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FILTER COFFEE MAKER
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best Filter Coffee Maker I have ever had. AND I have had many over the years. It is fast quiet and easy to clean. The thermal jug does keep coffee hot for several hours, not as some reports state that it does not. IT DOES WORK. The footprint is good and design fits in well with any kitchen. A truly excellent Coffee Maker. Using the genuine filter papers is best, and so easy and cheap to obtain from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Great once get used to it
customer_reviews.text: I had to experiment with amount of coffee and strength setting, but now that's sorted I am really pleased with this product. Keeps coffee hot for over 2 hours and pours well. I am using Melitta filters as our old permanent filter does not allow the head to close properly; this is actually much more convenient for disposal but obviously has a cost. I have de-scaled once using distilled vinegar 50/50: the de-calc indicator came on after 6 weeks. Only 4* because of the price.
customer_reviews.author: KTY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Coffee/hot for hours
customer_reviews.text: I was really sceptical about buying a coffee machine without a hotplate. Needn't have worried. The stainless steel jug on the Melitta coffee machine keeps coffee hot for up to 3 hours (easily) without the 'stewed' taste that can occur with hotplate machines. Love my purchase. Great delivery without issues. Very happy to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed very. Until I, I approached Melitta.
customer_reviews.text: Unbreakable but chippable... Be aware I had trouble trying to get sup port in the end I approached Melitta they sent me a remplacement thank you. This is What I expected Amazon to do. NOW I HAPPY. Love the machine and it's a definite 2 hr heating the coffee. Once again GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE FROM MELITTA NOT AMAZON...
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Coffee Drinker...
customer_reviews.text: One of the best products I’ve ever got. Haven’t rated the timer because I’m just manual - brew when I’m ready! Once you work out your favourite blend & strength it’s top notch. Aroma set to just off max, Taylors After Dark (other coffees are available) 7 spoon measures to 8 large cup measure...perfect brew!
customer_reviews.author: stuart bailey

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd bought this sooner
customer_reviews.text: Really smart filter coffee machine, that also makes a really good cup of coffee! No pods, so no waste. Machine is only in use whilst brewing the coffee, then keeps warm for a few hours in the insulated jug, so better for the electric bill. Jug doesn't spill when pouring, like previous models we've had. Stainless steel jug also means it can't be shattered as has happened in the past. Swing out coffee granule bin, so not risk of coffee ending up in the water reservoir. Water can be poured in from both sides of the machine, in a decent side space, so again, not spillages like previous makes of machine.
customer_reviews.author: Ciaran Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed at lack of coffee smell
customer_reviews.text: A rare review from me, but you need to know that if you want your place to smell of brewing coffee, this is not the machine for you. The vacuum flask keeps the coffee hot for hours without a hot plate, making it ecofriendly. But the flask is sealed, with a valve allowing coffee to drip through. This means hardly any coffee aroma comes from the machine. That said, the coffee it makes is great. I found Lavazza 5 is the best. Coarser ground coffees did not work well. I do love it. But I wanted my place to fill with the smell of brewing coffee.
customer_reviews.author: fiddlesticks

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed in the morning, if you're lazy but buy this
customer_reviews.text: I've been getting more info my coffees over the last few years and I was content with my French press up until recently where it started becoming a chore. Looked into filter machines and this would seemed to fit the bill. The timer setting is perfect as I just set it for 9am after I put in a new filter paper each night + grounded coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Will S

customer_reviews.title: Love our new coffee maker
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product - insulated jug is very efficient and keeps coffee hot for hours without stewing it. Being stainless steel, rather than glass, it won't explode, showering the kitchen with tiny fragments of glass, like the Bosch one we had before. It is easy to see the level of water in the tank, very important when you have just got up in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: John Morse

customer_reviews.title: An excellent piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.text: An excellent piece of equipment. Previous had a filter coffee maker that used a glass jug and incorporated a hot-plate. This is far more efficient. It uses electricity for about 15 minutes and then keeps the coffee hot for a number of hours due to the insulated jug. Additionally, once the coffee has been made the jug can be removed a placed in any convenient location.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Pettit

customer_reviews.title: The perfect sidekick for COVID times.
customer_reviews.text: I use this coffe machine in my desk. During these COVID times, having a big jug of coffee (that keeps warm for over 3 hours) this has been my fuel. As my home-office is also my room, setting it 5 minutes before the alarm sounds, allows me to just get up and pour a nice mug of coffee -and waking up to the smell of fresh coffe is unbeatable. The only thing that could improve is the strenght. I bought the intense filters and set it in the full intensity, but I think I need a little extra -but that's a personal opinion. Really good machine, absolutely recommended for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolás Camino

customer_reviews.title: WOW just WOW
customer_reviews.text: After using many coffee machines over the years Aeropress at the moment.excellent machine but it has a drawback like many of these appliances ,they only make one mug full. this little beauty makes five mug fulls {10 cups on the water gauge} the timer is a great add on ,woke up this morning to coffee .a great machine ,great flavour i use Taylors of harrowgate Hot java Lava strength 6 .the thermal jug keeps it hot for a long time .just buy it
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. L. Davies

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for hot coffee morning till lunch
customer_reviews.text: Great cup of coffee , you can adjust the drip and intensity so you may need to tinker to your taste. Most important though the stainless steel flask keeps coffee hot for ages - brewed a pot at 8:30am and it was still drinkably hot at lunchtime , even at 4pm when i emptied the pot to clean it was still warm and drinkable. No hot plate so coffee isn’t stewed and re-heated
customer_reviews.author: SMc

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great coffee machine.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this coffee machine while in lockdown and working from home, I must say I was so excited when it arrived. Easy to set up and use. The timer feature is just the best, waking up to the smell of fresh coffee is certainly something to get out of bed for! The thermos jug is much better than a glass one too. The decalc program tells you when it needs a clean. If you want a good quality, no fuss coffee filter machine then this one is for you. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Lozie

customer_reviews.title: Much improved; makes great coffee
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a previous Melitta Look coffee machine. This one is much nicer and user-friendly. The basket swings out for ease in filling the coffee (as opposed to lifting the lid where the coffee grinds sometimes got in the water reservoir). They kept the switch that allows you to make stronger or weaker coffee. The thermos pot pours coffee without dripping and keeps the coffee hot. I don't use the timer for making coffee the following morning b/c I preheat the pot with hot water and this keep the coffee hot longer. Am very pleased with the purchase and the improvements from my previous one.
customer_reviews.author: mmeharriet

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the Best purchase in a while!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely my best purchase in recent times, stainless steel pot, stylish, has integrated clock with backlight and best of all? IT KEEPS THE COFFEE HOT for several hours and warm throughout the day! Truly remarkable product and worthy of prizes!
customer_reviews.author: Dorin Duminica

customer_reviews.title: this is a fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: we use this everyday it keeps the coffee hot and you can take the pot to the table and not have to keep returning to the machine to keep it hot best coffee maker we have every had
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW LAYBOURN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine with a few small design flaws.
customer_reviews.text: As ever, Melitta makes excellent coffee machines. An especially good feature is the descaling function. The thermos type jug works well. The main gripe is the filter holder is a bit fiddly to get in place, but this is OK with practice. Overall very pleased and would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: K. W. E. Page

customer_reviews.title: Great thermal jug filter machine
customer_reviews.text: This makes great day to day coffee. The best feature is the thermal jug, keeps coffee hot and not stewed (a hot plate keeps the coffee on a simmer and so it goes nasty imo). Not sure the "aroma" knob does much but no matter, it's a decent, durable, easy to use machine. We use 60g of coffee for a full pot.
customer_reviews.author: Mr B.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific value
customer_reviews.text: After several months of daily use, I can confirm that this goober makes fantastic coffee and keeps it warm four hours! The only slight disappointment is that the jug has started to rust - it appears to collect water on the external seams.
customer_reviews.author: Pawthos

customer_reviews.title: Easy-Peasy and Great Coffee
customer_reviews.text: We replaced a cafetiere and a capsule machine with this when the family all hibernated at ours during lockdown. (Needed to be able to make more than a cup at a time!) Couldn't be happier. Quiet, small footprint, good coffee (depending on the coffee you buy, of course). The intensity knob was an unexpected bonus, and we use it! As drip coffee makers go, this is probably one of the best.
customer_reviews.author: ESS

customer_reviews.title: Works very well and has a easy timer function
customer_reviews.text: Good quality coffee machine. Makes my coffee for me in the morning so it's ready by the time I get out of bed. Great entry bit of kit for those like me who look to become more interested in making good coffee at home.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Insulated jug not hotplate 😊
customer_reviews.text: At first when I received this item I was unhappy that this didn't have a hotplate to keep the coffee warm. Howwrong was I? The jug is insulated and therefore keeps the coffee at a good temperature for at least 3 hours and without it being 'stewed' on the hotplate. This is the best coffee pot I have owned
customer_reviews.author: Dav7266

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting coffee. Easy quick &quiet
customer_reviews.text: A great machine that not only looks good (stainless steel model) but produces great tasting coffee. I use a good quality ground coffee (Lavazza at present). Very easy to use, quick brewing time & quiet in operations compared to most machines. Love it. Unfortunately since writing the review, have had to get a replacement, as the thermal pot began to leak from between the stainless steel and the black plastic. Appears to be water, not coffee. Doesn't seem to be a common fault, so hopefully a one off as this really is a great machine.
customer_reviews.author: Abcat

customer_reviews.title: Brillant!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best coffee machine we have had, so far! I read many reviews before buying this product and ordered it with some trepidation.....one never knows what is fact or fiction these days with reviews. Although I have only had it for a few days I am very impressed. It actually does what it says it will do and has delivered me the best cups of coffee. It somehow manages to get the best out flavour out of the filtered coffee, I have been using for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and does the job
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this coffee maker as it matches my kettle. Like the fact the jug is not glass and is more like a thermos flask. Really like the timer option so Coffee is ready when you go downstairs in the morning. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LadyTinTin

customer_reviews.title: Quality and ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine, so much more updated than my old one which lasted years. I prefer the thermos jug rather than a hot plate as the coffee doesn’t increase in strength between cups. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: G. J. Ross

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice coffee machine I had a Mellita coffee machine years ago so stuck with the same make the only thing I don’t like is that you have to hold down the sealing lever on top of jug but I have Arthritis it might not bother any one else
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Poor condition
customer_reviews.text: Received my coffee machine yesterday. Went for Melitta over others such as Andrew James, Beem, etc. Very disappointed to pay for this and receive in the condition I did. You would not expect to buy with the box ripped...
customer_reviews.author: Jai

customer_reviews.title: Great, great, great!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this coffee machine. After having a grind and brew by Cuisinart, I was a little worried this wouldn't be able to compete. However, I got it at a great price and not oly does it make great tasting coffee (I drink mine black), it's simple to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: F. Capocci

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says and  makes coffee
customer_reviews.text: Works well so far. Cut out time of 15 mins is a bit of a bind but will get use to that. Thermos type jug is a real bonus since no heat is lost as was the case with a glass jug and coffee is hotter than the old Krupp's machine. Once all the stickers are removed certainly looks the part.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine, especially love that it's insulated, no stewed coffee on a hot plate with this machine. We use it every morning for breakfast, amazing how long it stays hot too, not that it lasts that long lol
customer_reviews.author: jenniren

customer_reviews.title: No problems so far.
customer_reviews.text: I've used the Melitta coffee maker several times each day since purchasing it and so far I'm very pleased with it. It's easy to use and easy to clean. I chose a machine with an insulated jug rather than a hotplate as I find a hotplate can sometimes 'cook' the coffee and spoil it. I drink my coffee black and I'm pleased to say the insulated jug keeps the coffee hot for an impressive amount of time. I have no hesitation in recommending this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Insulated jug is a revelation!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! We drink a lot of coffee and get through a lot of machines. This is undoubtedly the best I have bought. It’s easy to use, the jug pours well and doesn’t drip. It makes great tasting coffee and because it is made by the company that makes the filter papers they fit perfectly and never fold over like I have experienced with other machines. The best part though is the insulated jug. I can’t recommend that highly enough. It easily keeps the coffee hot for over two hours. The machine is compact and looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: CJR

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Makes a good coffee. Worth noting it doesn't have a heating element to keep coffee hot, the Jug is Insulated so doesn't need it. You might not get the morning coffee smell though that the norm heat plate gives.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Stickler

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee maker ever!
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected- but good coffee beans but with this they taste better than in our trusted stove to machine and our old overpriced supposedly super duper coffee system ! Which subsequently has been sent to coffee maker heaven! Super product! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: KenF

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I love my Melitta machine. It makes great coffee, timer works great, very easy to clean. I have only good things to say about it. I wouldn't change a single thing and coming from me, that is a rare thing :D
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Not necessarily the best buy
customer_reviews.text: The selling point was the flask to keep the coffee warm, but unfortunately found it just tasted stewed so didnot use. Better value don't pay the extra for the flask just buy the basic machine without the thermos
customer_reviews.author: J. McNicol

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT a thermos jug!!
customer_reviews.text: It makes a nice cup of coffee but, contrary to what the advert says, the jug does NOT keep the coffee warm.... even after as short a time as five minutes the coffee is Luke warm.
customer_reviews.author: Kea Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Lovely hot coffee!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use! You do not need to use the timer. Filters after coffee ☕ can go straight into recycle food bin. Happy 😊 with this machine! Thermal flask is better for me than glass one as I am less likely to break it. The coffee seems hotter too😀
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lorna A.

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: This produces good coffee and is very easy to use and clean. The timer has worked perfectly and I can now get up to freshly brewed coffee. The only drawback for me is that the pot is awkward to clean but that is outweighed by everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Used this for months now. Durable, easy to use. You need separate disposable filters but they are easily found on amazon. After using a cheap filter coffee maker this one makes the coffee so much warmer and stronger. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: H.T

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee machine.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. Ive had many coffee machines this is the best so far. I love the timer feature. Makes perfect coffee. Love it. Will highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Combined with the reusable filter we bought, this machine produces a lovely cup of coffee, quickly! The filter that is offered by Amazon is not the best fit but it works. The feature we really like is the thermos jug. 2 hours after making a jug of coffee it is still warm and it is not bitter from sitting on the hotplate. leave the intensity knob at full, great flavour. We use Aldi French coffee and have used Tesco and Asda. The intensity knob seems to be the key to a lovely cup.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle Robinson TVR Instruments Ltd

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this coffee machine! It is easy to use and the coffee stays hot for hours in the jug. The timer function is great, I set it up the night before so I can have the coffee brewed ready for when I get up with my newborn. We have had a pod machine and a proper barista style machine in past but this suits our lifestyle at the moment. Also looks great and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Brill
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and I highly recommend it. Love the timer function and very easy to clean this item. Great not to have to worry about a hot plate. Can’t fault it!!! So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, AMAZING. I have set the timer to make coffee for 6am, returned home from work at 6pm and there's still steam rising from the cup when i pour it. Ok, it's not hot enough to drink by then but it's still hot. Great product. Really happy.
customer_reviews.author: Andy H

customer_reviews.title: Great machine.
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. Just used this machine for the first time and it’s very easy to use and clean. It brews coffee in about 3 minutes. The measurements however are a bit off as it states 125ml is a large cup. I would advise 2 large cups per person. Other than that I would easily recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B

customer_reviews.title: Brews good coffee!
customer_reviews.text: Quick at making coffee, and the insulated jug keeps the coffee hot for a good hour without using any electricity. The decals reminder is helpful too, though it’s purely elapsed time-based.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what is needed from a coffee machine
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a decent coffee machine with a Thermos, not one to drink that luke warm stuff that comes out of those pods, plus the unnecessary waste they produce. Love this machine, looks tidy, easy to fill and program, coffee is fresh, hot and ready at 6am, and the Thermos keeps it hot a few hours. Tip: don't fill completely, than top up with hot milk, stays hot till the afternoon. Oh, and didn't cost an arm and a leg, either. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This makes excellent tasting coffee and is so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This makes excellent tasting coffee and is so easy to use. Timer function is brilliant to wake up to hot pot of coffee in the mornings. After using a cafetiere for many years, the taste is different but noticeably there is very little residue in our cups when you have finished your cup of coffee - it must filter out more than a cafetiere. Great machine!
customer_reviews.author: Daddy Boris

customer_reviews.title: White version now has same spout as black version
customer_reviews.text: My parents have the black version, it's fantastic, so naturally I bought one too, got the white one, and the spout difference as mentioned in another review with photos has been resolved. Otherwise, the product is fantastic, and uses size 4 filters. Comes with a few in the box too in case you forget to buy some.
customer_reviews.author: azeria

customer_reviews.title: Morning Coffee tastes good
customer_reviews.text: works well for the price, coffee remains hot for approx. 21/2 hours but drinkable at 3, only downside for me is the fact you cant see at a glance how much coffee is left in the jug
customer_reviews.author: robs
